data.text: @JohnBoozman A great start of the day for us Arkansans would be for you to get on board and pass the Save Act nothing is more important at this time
@JendyJenD @JohnBoozman Agree that rural water needs attention, investing in infrastructure now saves problems later.

@JohnBoozman No more negotiations with our killers. The Islamic Republic has murdered Iranians for decades and now threatens the world. We reject reform and insider deals—we demand full regime change. Iran’s chosen transition leader is @PahlaviReza. Stand with the people, not terrorists.
@JohnBoozman SAVE ACT— all the rest is just show
